value_i18n.ar_SA: The current Liferay certification path for both sales & presales partner staff is achieved through virtual participation in the applicable Live Liferay Learning Path. These learning path modules are available live once per quarter and attendance is captured for each individual module. Please select your path below to register for the next available sessions to achieve certification prior to the December 31st 2023 audit. Should you have any questions please reach out to your CAM or the Liferay enablement team at, partner-enablement@liferay.com.
